description:
An eerie silence falls over the battlefield as Luffy and Ace share a heartbreaking final moment together. With his dying breath, Ace begs his brother to convey a message to his fellow pirates.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A la recherche d`une réponse. Ace aux Poings Ardents meurt au combat
Kotae o Sagashite: Hiken Ace Senjou ni Shisu
Looking for the Answer! Fire Fist Ace Dies on the Battlefield!
В поисках ответа! Смерть Огненного Кулака Эйса!
答えを探して 火拳[ひけん]エース戦場に死す
